pageContext.claim: “Mini Mike is part of the Fake News. They are all working together. In fact, Bloomberg isn't covering himself (too boring to do), or other Dems. Only Trump. That sounds fair! It’s all the Fake News Media, and that’s why nobody believes in them any more. ”
pageContext.analysis: The top editor of Bloomberg News said the newsroom would continue “our tradition” of not investigating Bloomberg, his family and his wealth, “and we will extend the same policy to his rivals in the Democratic primaries.” When Bloomberg was mayor of New York that meant the news organization looked at his policy proposals and initiatives. The news organization did not say it wasn’t reporting on the former mayor because it is “too boring to do so.”
